TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISymbolBinder

summary.span: Stellt einen Symbolbinder für verwalteten Code dar.

span.span: Represents a symbol binder for managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Diese Schnittstelle ist das verwaltete Pendant der- `ISymUnmanagedBinder` Schnittstelle, bei der es sich um eine der nicht verwalteten Symbol Speicher Schnittstellen handelt, die eine alternative Möglichkeit zum Lesen und Schreiben von Debugsymbolinformationen bieten.This interface is the managed counterpart of the `ISymUnmanagedBinder` interface, which is one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provide an alternate way to read and write debug symbol information.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader? GetReader (int importer, string filename, string searchPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader GetReader(int32 importer, string filename, string searchPath) cil managed
Public Function GetReader (importer As Integer, filename As String, searchPath As String) As ISymbolReader
public: System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::ISymbolReader ^ GetReader(int importer, System::String ^ filename, System::String ^ searchPath);
abstract member GetReader : int * string * string -> System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader
public System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolReader GetReader (int importer, string filename, string searchPath);

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is ISymbolBinder1.GetReader. ISymbolBinder1.GetReader takes the importer interface pointer as an IntPtr instead of an Int32, and thus works on both 32-bit and 64-bit architectures. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202=14202")]

[<System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is ISymbolBinder1.GetReader. ISymbolBinder1.GetReader takes the importer interface pointer as an IntPtr instead of an Int32, and thus works on both 32-bit and 64-bit architectures. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202=14202")>]

[System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is ISymbolBinder1.GetReader. ISymbolBinder1.GetReader takes the importer interface pointer as an IntPtr instead of an Int32, and thus works on both 32-bit and 64-bit architectures. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202=14202")]

[<System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is ISymbolBinder1.GetReader. ISymbolBinder1.GetReader takes the importer interface pointer as an IntPtr instead of an Int32, and thus works on both 32-bit and 64-bit architectures. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202=14202")>]
[System.Obsolete("This interface is not 64-bit clean. Use ISymbolBinder1 instead")]
[<System.Obsolete("This interface is not 64-bit clean. Use ISymbolBinder1 instead")>]

param.name: filename
param.span: Der Name der Datei, für die die Readerschnittstelle erforderlich ist.

span.span: The name of the file for which the reader interface is required.

param.name: searchPath
param.span: Der Suchpfad zum Suchen der Symboldatei.

span.span: The search path used to locate the symbol file.

summary.span: Ruft die Schnittstelle des Symbolreaders für die aktuelle Datei ab.

span.span: Gets the interface of the symbol reader for the current file.
The interface that reads the debugging symbols.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Wenn eine Metadatenschnittstelle, ein Dateiname und ein Suchpfad angegeben werden, gibt die Methode die-Schnittstelle zurück, die die dem Modul zugeordneten Debugsymbole liest.When given a metadata interface, a file name, and a search path, the method returns the interface that reads the debugging symbols associated with the module.
